answers.answer: The first thing a doctor normally does is do a blood test to elminate physical problems causing your issues.  Did you see a physc-doctor?  If you just saw a regulare practioner, I suggest you see a physc-doc.  Don't give up!
ye went c a normal doctor wot kind of physical problems r we thinking of do u know?

It could be mood issues due to thyroid or a vitamin/mineral deficency.  A blood test also will show any other issues such as liver function and will assist the doctor to know which medications to prescribe if you are having issues with your liver functioning.  It will also indicate diabetes and which medications would be best or not best prescribed for blood sugar.  It is a common procedure before prescribing medication...it's for your benefit.
thankyou for ur support in this very diffucult and confusing time in my life

question: finally plucked up the courage to go see the doctor today have to go and get a blood test in a few hours y do i need 1 of these? i went looking 4 answers about y i am feeling like this and have come home none the wiser. it feels kike iam searching for something im never going to get
title: finally went to doctors
